title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, embeddings and tool-calling pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; folders, personas, code highlighting.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper that adds conversation memory, markdown rendering and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot alternative using Ollama for local code completion in VS Code.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings and tool calls.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: discord-ollama
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers users with any Ollama model; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function calling, vision, voice, RAG, fine-tuning and edge deployments.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for iOS/macOS apps; async/await wrappers around Ollama REST.

title: ollama-nvidia-jetson
summary: Dockerfile & scripts to run Ollama on NVIDIA Jetson devices with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM features in pipelines.
